p: The peels of C. limon fruits were dried at room temperature and then powdered by means of a miller. After that, the peel powder (50 g) was transferred to a Clevenger apparatus containing 750 ml distilled water and the hydrodistillation‐based extraction process was completed (3 hr). The obtained C. limon essential oil (CLEO) was collected in glass vials and then stored at 4°C (Alizadeh Behbahani, Shahidi, et al., 2017).
